bibl.title: Isis on the Nile. Egyptian Gods in Hellenistic and Roman Egypt. Proceedings of the IVth International Conference of Isis Studies, Liège, November 27-29, 2008. Michel Malaise in honorem. (Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 171.)
bibl.note: 11 contributions. - Pp. vii-viii: L.Br. and J.M.V., Foreword; - ix: List of Participants; - xi-xiv: Abbreviations and Bibliography; - xv-xix: Michel Malaise: Bibliographie isiaque; - 1-6: Michel MALAISE, La gens isiaque de retour au pays; - 7-36 et 5 figg.: M.J.V., Understanding Egypt in Egypt and Beyond; - 291-293: Index nominum. - I. Introductions: The Role of Egyptian Religion and Tradition in Hellenistic and Roman Egypt. - II. Case Studies: Cults of Isis in Hellenistic and Roman Egypt.
